content.prompt: Assume the market for a good is in equilibrium. An increase in the market supply of the good will result in

choices.label: a shortage at the original price of the good, which causes the market price to decrease
a shortage at the original price of the good, which causes the market price to increase
a surplus at the original price of the good, which causes the market price to decrease
a surplus at the original price of the good, which causes the market price to increase
neither a surplus nor a shortage

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
